participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with my girlfriend, Luis.
i enjoy eating vegetarian food.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
i write.
when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.

participant_2.background:
My parents are both very supportive of my dream to be a veterinarian.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.
i can play the violin.

content.text: I'm Luis and I'm a vegetarian. What are your eating habits?
I like to eat vegetarian food because it's good for the environment!
I agree! I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
Oh no! That sounds terrible! I hope you recovered quickly.
I did, thanks! I'm a writer and when I'm not touring with the band, I like to garden.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to write too. I'm also trying to become a veterinarian.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make a great veterinarian.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that you're a writer. Maybe we can collaborate on something in the future.
That would be great! I'd love to work with you.
Great! I'll send you my contact information.
Awesome! I look forward to hearing from you.
